description.en: Frieza has arrived on Earth! Defeat his Golden Form to save the planet!
description.es: ¡Freezer ha llegado a la Tierra! ¡Derrota su forma dorada para salvar el planeta!

completionMessages.en: You defeated Frieza! Earth is saved!
completionMessages.es: ¡Has derrotado a Freezer! ¡La Tierra está a salvo!
